line: ok chandler mon there is only one bananna nut muffin left
there you go enjoy your coffee
that was there when i got here
hey you guys you will never guess who is coming to new york
quick phoebe tell us before he can swallow
oh ok ryan that guy i went out with who is in the navy
you went out with a guy in the navy
yeah i met him when i was playing guitar in washington square park
ryan threw in salt water taffy because he did not have any change
hey is that when you wrote salt water taffy man
no he is my submaring guy
he resurfaces like every couple years and we have the most amazing three days together
only this time he is coming for two weeks
two whole weeks which means yay
so wait this guy goes down for like two years at a time
thatll teach you to lick my muffin
well i just spoke to carol
yeah so if you have not already had it chances are you are gonna get it
well never had it i feel so left out
honey you made the bed again
i told you you do not have to do that
ooh then i guess the panty raid last night was totally uncalled for
ok i am going to take a shower and today i will be singing jim crochees leroy brown
hey mon i have a question
is leroy the baddest man in the whole damn town or the fattest man in the whole damn town
otherwise the song would be fat fat leroy brown
you know what the way you did it was just fine
then you are redoing it because
if i tell you you will think crazy
you are pretty much running that risk either way
ok you see the tag should not be at the top left corner it should be at the bottom right corner
oh well that is not so crazy
alright you see these little flower blossoms
they should be facing up not down because well the head of the bed is where the sun would be
you do not love me any more do you
actually if it is possible i love you more
wow well then come on i wanna show you how to fold the toilet paper into a point
hey look joey just saying if you need something to hold you over i can get you a job right here as an entry level processor
but do not you need experience for a job like that
it is not that hard to learn
and as for people realizing you have no idea what you are doing hey you are an actor
act like a processor people will think you are a processor
hey chandler heres this mornings projections
joey is a uh fellow processor
people want the processing the one they call
uhh well right now in between things
one day you are processing the next day you are not so much
i was just telling joey about the opening in fleischmans group
whatever you do do not touch his sandwiches
oh this lipstick looks just great on you
you look fabulous honey you really do
for god sakes dim the lights
he is just gonna be so glad that you do not have barnicles on your butt
well no no you have to stay back
which is so ironic considering a vegetarian
why are not you at home in bed
because my my grandmothers never had chicken pox
please please tell me you have because oh my god i forgot how cute you are
if i had one wish it would be to build a time machine go back to when i was 7 when jimmy hauser had the chicken pox
i would grab that kid and rub him all over my face
yeah or you know you could just wish that i did not have them now
can i please see your face
you do not want to see a face covered with pox
your face could be covered with lochs i would not care
because i tell you i had the most amazing two weeks planned for us and almost everything i had in mind we had to be a lot closer than this
phoebe i have spent the last eight months in a steel tube with men thinking about this moment
i am not gonna let a bunch of itchy spots stand between us
ok this is the most romantic disease ever had
hey how is the first day goin
it is mostly just putting numbers from one column into another column
hey and everbody is so nice
i just had a good talk with that lady with the red hair jeannie
jeannie the head of east coast operations jeannie
yeah turns out our kids go to the same school
i figure my character has kids
ya know there is not a part of that sentence i do not need explained
well see when you are acting you need to think about stuff like that
my character joseph the processor guy has two little girls ashley and brittany
well invisible kids can be that way sometimes
joseph and his wife karen are thinking of having a third kid
that is some pretty powerful imaginary sperm you must have there
you know what makes the itching even worse
that you do not stop talking about it
here we go double sixes here we go
here we go come to mama just getting ready to roll the dice
this is what i do for luck ok
you know we cannot we will scar
uhh i cannot stop thinking about it
i just wanna grab all these houses and rub em all over my body
you know you want it you know you want it too come on
let us just be bad it will feel so good
now do me do my back
oh stop that stop that right now
you know i might have expected this of you phoebe but ryan you are a military man
you and milton have to join us on the boat
karenll pack a lunch you will bring the kids we will make a day of it
we are gonna have to set that up
well sure you will teach her a lesson when she steps off the dock onto nothing
uh listen bing i received your memo
so we are not gonna receive the systems report until next friday
well the people in my group wanna spend the holiday weekend with their families
i have a family gonna be here
yeah bing what is that about
it is about cutting my people a little slack ya know for morale
look if you wanna see some rough numbers i can get them to you by wednesday
this company was not built on rough numbers
have the final numbers on my desk by tuesday
uh if you say so sir
hey hey i just figure josephs the kinda guy that likes to mix it up
ya know get in there ruffle some feathers
look sorry but that is what joseph does ok
if you try to pull somethin he will call you on it
what are you tryin to pull he will say
was i supposed to bring something too
this is for the scratchy twins out there
i taped oven mits to their hands
it is for their own good
you know i like the way you have efficiently folded this tab under
see in a tape emergency you could shave valuable seconds off your time
oh i love that i can be totally neurotic around you now
do not you like it better now that everything on your desk is perpendicular
if it is not a right angle it is a wrong angle
you are gonna do what to my clocks
gonna set them to my time
see in my bedroom i set my clock six minutes fast
because it is in a slightly different time zone than the kitchen
no forget it not gonna tell you now
you do not have any of these cute little obsessive things
alright well tell me one of yours
one of my things is i always separate my sweat socks from my dress socks
what if they get mixed up
boy i would just uh i would freak out
i hate this you are too normal
i cannot believe my boyfriend does not have a thing
my boyfriend does not have a thing
see if anyone overheard that i did not come off well
because he has a strong suspicion that you dropped the ball on the lender project
wha wh why why why does he suspect that
becasue at first he thought it was joseph
but after he asked joseph about it turns out it was you
anyway i just thought you should know
look joey sorry i realize this is the role of a lifetime for ya and if i could just fire joseph i would but unfortunately that is not possible so gonna have to let both of you go
what are you talking about everybody loves joseph
i do not i hate joseph ok
i think he is a brown nosing suck up
you know why because he is not in your department
so i cannot fire joseph but uh i can sleep with his wife
thinking about having an affair with her
what the hell are you doing to me man
oh well it is not me it is my character chandy
yeah the rogue processor who seduces his co workers wives for sport and then laughs about it the next day at the water cooler
in fact i have her panties right there in my drawer
if it means that much to you uh go find something else
it is just that i gonna miss joseph
can i please take these off
i swear i will not scratch
and there is a peach cobbler warming in the oven so the plates gonna be hot but that should not be a problem for you
oh look a low budget puppet show
it is such a shame you cannot see which finger holding up
i must tell you you look beautiful tonight
you know what that is it that is it
i have to sleep have to on this side of the bed
you have to sleep on this side of the bed because i have to sleep on this side of the bed
or so i would have you believe
big deal so you have a side of the bed everybody has a side of the bed
hey come on you have not heard my reason yet
ok i have to sleep on the west side because i grew up in california and otherwise the ocean would be on the wrong side
oh my god you are a freak
so uh ryan were you shipping off to
so do you have like any nuclear weapons on board
well do you get to look through one of those like those periscope thingys
wow it it is neat learning about submarines
i better get out of here gonna miss my flight
it was nice to meet you
so do you uh think we can get you one of those uh uniform things
can you believe how we spent our two weeks together
we did not do any of the romantic things i had planned like having a picnic at central park and ya know coffee at central perk
is this what you had in mind
well then uh we better make this night count
oh wait i forgot to turn off the cappucino machine
oh no no my purse my purse my purse my purse my purse my pu rse
i forgot to turn off the bathroom light
alright you know why do not i just meet you upstairs
